author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: minimal browser version of jslint and csslint with zero npm-dependencies
name: jslint-lite

scripts.build-doc: node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shReadmeExportPackageJson && node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shDocApiCreate "{ exampleFileList:['test.js','index.js'], moduleDict:{'jslint-lite':{aliasList:['jslint_lite'],exports:require('./index.js')}} }"
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shReadmeExportPackageJson && node_modules/.bin/utility2 test test.js
